{"step_by_step_thinking": "The gingival embrasure is the V-shaped space between the teeth under the contact area. As we move from the anterior (front) to the posterior (back) of the mouth, the shape and size of the teeth change. Molars and premolars are larger than incisors and canines, so the space between them, the gingival embrasure, becomes larger.", "answer_choice": "B. Larger"}
